field.name: summary
field.value: FormHelper's disablevalidation parameter only works when in Push command and on field

field.name: description
field.value: The FormHelper only allows disablevalidation to take effect when it is both in the Push command's parameters and in the field's parameters. It doesn't work if nothing has been Pushed, the Push command doesn't have this parameter or the field doesn't have this parameter.

comment.author: jsimons
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Applied''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''2.0''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
